title: Survey-Based Instructional Design to Improve Awareness of Medical Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in medical education and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Need to establish a flexible learning environment for working adult learners, utilizing BYOD-based digital collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can systematically diagnose learning environments using the Dundee Ready Education Environment Measure (DREEM).
Learners can derive improvement strategies for educational environments based on survey results.
Learners can analyze differences in educational environments across medical specialties and propose tailored instructional strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
